short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Feel the wind with every tab! Customize shortcuts, use Google search, and enjoy stunning McLaren 750S Spider wallpapers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take the top down and accelerate your browsing with the McLaren 750S Spider New Tab Extension! A powerful Google search bar awaits in every new tab, delivering performance as smooth as a ride in the 750S Spider. With popular site shortcuts at your fingertips, and the ability to add your own custom shortcuts, your browsing is as personal and high-speed as this convertible supercar.

Every new tab features a different McLaren 750S Spider wallpaper, showcasing its aerodynamic beauty and open-top thrill. The extension offers 10 updated backgrounds, so you can experience the freedom and power of this supercar with every click.

Whether you're exploring the web or imagining cruising with the wind in your hair, this extension provides quick access to your favorite sites with visuals that keep your tabs exciting and stylish.

Let the McLaren 750S Spider take your browsing experience to the next level with speed and elegance in every tab!
